---
title: "protocol_18"
---

Protocol_18.m  - based on protocol 10 - but includes the 'curtain' ON /
OFF stimuli.

## Protocol Parameters

| Parameter | Value |
|:----------|:------|
| Conditions | 6 |
| Patterns Used | 3 |
| t_acclim | 2s |
| t_pause | 0.015 |


## Conditions

| # | Pattern | Speed | Duration | Description |
|--:|:--------|------:|---------:|:------------|
| 1 | [Pattern 9](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_09.qmd) | 10 | -s |  |
| 2 | [Pattern 9](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_09.qmd) | 10 | -s |  |
| 3 | [Pattern 19](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_19.qmd) | 10 | -s | ON curtain |
| 4 | [Pattern 19](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_19.qmd) | 10 | -s |  |
| 5 | [Pattern 20](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_20.qmd) | 10 | -s | OFF curtain |
| 6 | [Pattern 20](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_20.qmd) | 10 | -s |  |
